data.text:
Britannia industries is one of India’s leading food company with 100 years of legacy and annual revenue more than Rs 9,000 crore.

Under Britannia most trusted foods brands are

01 Biscuits

Good day, Marie gold, Nutri choice, Milk bikis, tiger, 50-50, jimjam, Treat, little heart, pure magic, Nice time, Biscafe

02 Dairy

Come alive (paneer), High aroma (Ghee), Dairy whitener, come alive (thick dahi)

03 Snacking

Treat (choco), Time pass (chips)

04 Cake

Tiffin Fun, layerZ (cake), Muffils, Nut and Raisin (cake), Rollyo (cake)

05 Rusk - Toastea

06 Breads

Britannia (100%) whole wheat bread, Fruit fun breads, healthy slice breads,

07 Healthy Bars

Be you ( Fruits and seed), Be you (Protein bar)

NUSLIN WADIA is the chairman of Britannia industries

Joint ventures of Britannia industries

01 Britannia food limited

Britannia joints venture with chiptia of Greece

02 Britannia Bel foods private limited

Britannia enter joint venture with Bel SA to manufacture and sell cheese products in India and some other markets in the world.

Britannia industries is one of the Oldest companies of the Wadia Group.

Company 132+ years track record

Headquarter of Britannia industries in Hungerfood streets, Kolkata

Britannia served his product worldwide

Shareholding pattern of Britannia industries

01 Promoter – 50.55%

02 Mutual fund – 5.43%

03 DII – 9.54%

04 FII – 18.99%

05 Retail and others – 15.44%

Valuation/fundamental of Britannia industries

It is large cap company

01 Market cap – Rs 1,20,405 crore

02 CMP (current market price) – Rs 4980

03 Cash – Rs 63.85 crore

04 Debt – Rs 266 crore

05 P/E – 56.54

06 Dividend yield – 1.46%

If someone invested Rs 100,000 in Britannia share what is the real value now.

In 2010 one share price of Britannia industries is Rs 150 (approx). If someone Investor Rs 1 lakh in Britannia industries he gots 666 shares. Let’s find out the present value of 666 shares

Britannia industries bonus and stock split history

01 Stock split (2010) – Face value 10 to 2 – 3330 shares

02 Stock split (2018) – face value 2 to 1 – 6660 shares

03 Bonus 2018 - (1:1) - NCD

04 Bonus 2020 – (1:1) – NCD

Non convertible debentures

In 2024

Britannia industries 666 shares convert 6660 shares.

In 2024 price of one share Britannia industries is Rs 4980

Value of 6660 shares is Rs 33,160,880

Means Britannia industries Rs 1 lakh convert Rs 3.3 crore (approx)

Time period – 13 years

Note – Compounding is the 8th wonder of this world

Some interesting facts about Britannia industries limited

Britannia is no. 01 Biscuits brand in India

Britannia has a very strong balance sheet. FMCG market is very big and there is huge untapped market for Britannia.

In 2023 Britannia Crossed Rs 16,301 crore revenue

Subsidiaries of Britannia industries

01 Manna foods private limited

02 International bakery products limited

Number of employees work in Britannia industries are 4480.

Britannia is a super brand and with super brand power it will continue to rule the market and will keep growing fast and will continue rewarding to its shareholders with bonus shares and dividend in future also.
